title: Landscaping1
header: John is a contractor with insurance that covers property loss, damage, or personal injury claims that arise due to his “landscaping” work.
continuation: John is employed by a family, the Smiths, to install an in-ground trampoline in the family’s backyard. A few years after John completes the project, the Smiths successfully sue John for injuries that their daughter sustained while playing on the trampoline. John files a claim with his insurance company to recover losses incurred from the lawsuit.
notes: install an in-ground trampoline in the family’s backyard
